name: confirmed-event-notification-request
description: Request parameters for the ConfirmedEventNotification service, used to send event notifications that require acknowledgment.

fields.name: process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier for this notification.

fields.name: initiating-device-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the device initiating the notification.

fields.name: event-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object generating the event.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp when the event occurred.

fields.name: notification-class
fields.description: The notification class for this event.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: The priority of the event notification.

fields.name: event-type
fields.description: The type of event being reported.

fields.name: message-text
fields.description: Optional descriptive text message about the event.

fields.name: notify-type
fields.description: The type of notification (alarm or event).

fields.name: ack-required
fields.description: Indicates whether acknowledgment is required. Optional.
